titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Branford College, Yale University, Records of the Master
Branford College, Yale University, Records of the Master
titlestmt.author: compiled by Staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:18

did.unittitle: Branford College, Yale University, records of the master

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of administrative files maintained by the master of Branford College, Yale University, including correspondence, memoranda, lists, reports, and topical files.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 13-D-2 (YRG 13-D-2), Records of the master of Branford College.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Accessto the records is partially restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Branford College, Yale University, Records of the Master (RU 831). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of administrative files maintained by the master of Branford College, Yale University, including correspondence, memoranda, lists, reports, and topical files.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The title "Master" for chief executive officers of residential colleges was changed to "Head of College" in April of 2016.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged in reverse chronological order by academic year.
